alert.note: Alert for Henry; Weakley (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 19 at 2:31AM CDT until July 19 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN WEAKLEY AND HENRY COUNTIES... At 231 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Palmersville, or 15 miles northwest of Paris, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Paris, Cottage Grove, Palmersville, Springville, Routon, Puryear, Haigler Ridge, Jones Mill, Foundry Hill, Manleyville, Old Springville, Como, India, Mill Creek, Osage, Brundige, Sunnyside, Van Dyke, Whitlock and Spring Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
